title: These Halloween Movies Will Get You in the Trick-or-Treating Mood Without Scaring You Half to Death
text: There's nothing like celebrating the ~spooky season~ by snuggling up on the couch with friends and a big bucket of popcorn and diving into all of the Halloween classics. But, if horror movies aren't your thing, picking a flick to get you into the fall mood can seem pretty difficult. Basically every Halloween movie was created to scare the socks off you, but spending a night awake because you're scared your stuffed animals are going to come to life and kill you may not really sound appealing. So, if you don't like scary movies, but you still want to enjoy a Halloween-themed movie night with your pals, check out these 20 non-scary Halloween movies that will get you ready to trick-or-treat, without scaring you half to death.
